title: Apple's Tim Cook calls India 'huge opportunity' after tech meeting at White House with Prime Minister Modi
description: Top tech execs met with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the White House on Friday to discuss business opportunities and investments

title: Beauty and tech company Oddity, which runs Il Makiage, files to go public
description: The beauty and tech company that created Il Makiage and Spoiled Child has filed to go public using the ticker ODD.

title: ChatGPT probably won’t help you beat the stock market—but it can assist investors in other ways, says CFP
description: ChatGPT and other AI chatbots are not the best tools for building a portfolio, but they can be useful to investors in other ways.

title: Trump gets first GOP endorsements since his indictment in classified documents case
description: A conservative audience booed former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie when he criticized Trump for a "failure of leadership."

title: Bitcoin rises above $31,000 to highest level in more than a year to cap the week
description: The benchmark cryptocurrency extended the week's gain to more than 17%.

title: Companies without direct A.I. link try to ride the Wall Street craze
description: Here's what some companies outside of the artificial intelligence sphere are presenting an A.I. to investors and the public.

title: Musk-Zuckerberg 'cage match' PPV would cost $100, bring in over $1 billion: 'This would be the biggest fight ever in the history of the world'
description: The tech CEOs told White they are 'absolutely dead serious' about fighting one another.

title: After a ‘safe sex’ lecture, this 30-year-old co-founded a company to bring at-home STD tests to the LGBTQ community
description: David Stein's first STD test was an intrusive nightmare. He ended up co-founding Ash Wellness to make at-home STD tests widely available.

title: Goldman Sachs faces big writedown on CEO David Solomon’s ill-fated GreenSky deal
description: The turbulence marks the latest fallout from CEO David Solomon's decision to exit most of Goldman's consumer efforts.

title: A.I. is now the biggest spend for nearly 50% of top tech executives across the economy: CNBC survey
description: Close to half of CISOs and CTOs from pharma to utilities say AI is now their biggest spend, according to the latest CNBC Technology Executive Council survey.

title: Starbucks union says workers at more than 150 stores will strike over Pride decor
description: The union representing Starbucks baristas claimed some stores were not allowed to put up Pride month decorations.

title: European business activity slows in June as higher interest rates begin to bite
description: S&P Global's Chris Williamson described the numbers as "worrying" as the euro zone's flash composite PMI dropped to 50.3 in June.

title: U.S.-India relations enter a new chapter and could unlock even more tech and defense deals
description: The U.S. and India agreed to collaborate across space and artificial intelligence, while also collaborating to secure resilient critical minerals supply chains.

title: Siemens Energy shares plunge more than 30% as wind turbine worries deepen
description: Siemens Energy scrapped its 2023 profit outlook after a review of its wind turbine unit exposed problems deeper than expected.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Seeking shelter in tech
description: Investors have been lulled by a sense of security. But they're not rudely returned to a world of continual rate hikes.

title: Singapore kicks off the world's first Olympic Esports Week
description: More than 100 athletes from around the world will be participating at the inaugural Olympic Esports Week in Singapore.

title: Check out this $110 million tech campus being built in Lithuania — the largest in Europe
description: The Tech Zity development is inspired by British renovation projects such as the Battersea Power Station and Tate Modern art gallery.

title: A.I. has a discrimination problem. In banking, the consequences can be severe
description: When it comes to banking and financial services, the problem of artificial intelligence amplifying existing human biases can be severe.

title: Turkish lira sinks to fresh lows following the central bank's interest rate hike
description: Newly appointed Governor Hafize Gaye Erkan hinted at more hikes until the inflation situation in the country improves.

title: Biden says his 'dictator' comment on Xi has no 'real consequence' on China ties
description: The U.S. president brushed off concerns his off-the-cuff comment about President Xi Jinping undermined diplomatic efforts to mend fragile ties with China.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Rate hikes and red lights
description: Investors have been lulled by a sense of security. But they're not rudely returned to a world of continual rate hikes.
